actionPack.name: MySQL
actionPack.description: Integration actions for the MySQL relational database server.
actionPack.author: CA Technologies

SCRIPTAction.name: MySQL - Upload Data
SCRIPTAction.description: Restore a database into the MySQL server from a file.

inputParamList.name: Username
inputParamList.description: The username to authenticate with the database.

inputParamList.name: Password
inputParamList.description: The password to authenticate with the database.

inputParamList.name: Database Name
inputParamList.description: The name of the database to use for this action.

inputParamList.name: Table Name
inputParamList.description: The name of the table to use for this action.

inputParamList.name: File Path
inputParamList.description: The full path to the file to use.

outputParamList.name: Execution Output
outputParamList.description: Standard out from the command execution.

scripts.content: mysql ${Database Name} -u ${Username} --password=${Password} --execute="LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE '${File Path}' INTO TABLE ${Table Name};"
scripts.name: MySQLUploadData1415599639900.bat

scripts.content: mysql ${Database Name} -u ${Username} --password=${Password} --execute="LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE '${File Path}' INTO TABLE ${Table Name};"
scripts.name: MySQLUploadData1415599639902.sh
